Description:
Oversee receipt, storage, and distribution of goods.
Develop efficient inventory management processes.
Coordinate with suppliers and transportation companies.
Supervise and evaluate warehouse staff.
Maintain accurate inventory records.
Implement safety protocols for the warehouse.
Analyze and improve warehouse operations.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration, or related field.
Experienced in pastry field from 2 to 3 years.
Previous experience in warehouse management or a similar role.
Knowledge of inventory management systems and best practices.
Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
Leadership abilities and the capacity to manage and motivate a team.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
